mapper.select: SELECT u.email, u.role, uc.courses_code, s.trainee FROM users_courses uc JOIN users u ON uc.email = u.email JOIN Subject s ON s.courses_code = uc.courses_code WHERE u.role = 30 AND uc.courses_code IN ( SELECT courses_code FROM users_courses JOIN users ON users.email = users_courses.email WHERE users.role = 20 and users.email = #{user.email} );
SELECT subject_code, courses_code, professor, trainee, score FROM subject WHERE trainee = #{trainee}
mapper.update: UPDATE subject SET subject_code = #{subjectCode}, courses_code = #{courseCode}, professor = #{professor}, trainee = #{trainee}, score = #{score} WHERE subject_code = #{subjectCode} AND courses_code = #{coursesCode} AND trainee = #{trainee};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subject ( subject_code, courses_code, professor, trainee, score ) VALUES ( #{subjectCode}, #{coursesCode}, #{professor}, #{trainee}, #{score} )
